modules.description: Parses and validates LEDES98BI-formatted invoice files by processing input lines into structured data, identifying format and content discrepancies. It operates on lists of strings representing file lines, returning either a list of all errors or stopping at the first error encountered. Useful for validating legal billing data files against the LEDES98BI standard during ingestion or import workflows.

Parses and validates LEDES1998B formatted invoice data line by line. It processes string lists representing invoice lines and reports validation errors either by collecting all errors or failing on the first one. Useful for invoice processing systems requiring strict format compliance checks.

This module processes and validates LEDES-formatted invoice data by parsing lines into structured formats and checking compliance with the LEDES98BI and LEDES1998B standards. It operates on lists of strings representing invoice lines, offering validation modes that either collect all errors or halt at the first one. It supports strict format validation for legal billing data ingestion workflows, ensuring correctness during import or processing. Example uses include validating invoice headers, line items, and totals against standard schemas.
